verbLexeme: 2. To drink using a teacup, or any fine piece of crockery.
nominalLexeme: 1. A drink made with hot water and the chopped, dried leaves of a particular bush. Milk and sugar are often added to the drink. English = tea.
2. A cup of tea, or a cup of any other drinks made with hot water and leaves or flowers.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: drinking tea from a teacup and saucer.
